entry.title: Photos Post 22: Special Events (after 1975), Part 64
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 2 Photos from the special event 2010-0321 Birthday Pūjā, Hangar (now Nirmal Temple), Albera Ligure, Alessandria, Italy have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 2 low resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 2 Photos in the smallest gallery: Collection 2010.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
